Job.Description: Will help the doctor and repair Constructs.

Gains.GainTrait: Dealing with patients and talking with them about their problems has made ${name} more Charismatic.
Handling heavy parts and working with heavy tools has made ${name} much Stronger.
Gains.LoseTrait: ${name} seems to finally be getting over her shyness. She's not always so Nervous anymore.
Working with dirty, greasy equipment has damaged ${name}'s hair, skin and nails making her less Elegant.
